markdown:
Skip to main content 

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

To challenge an apprenticeship level, you need to complete a self-assessment with a score of 65% or higher and save the PDF version of your results.

Find your trade below: 

Self-Assessment Forms

Construction Electrician and Industrial Electrician

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=electrician-common-core-1)

[Level 2](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=electrician-common-core-2)

[Level 3](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=electrician-common-core-3)

Powerline Technician

Self-assessment forms are not available for this trade. You will need to register as an apprentice to work towards certification or challenge the certification exam if you are qualified as a [Trade Qualifier](/experienced-workers-stc-trades)[.](/experienced-workers-stc-trades)

Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Mechanic

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=refrigeration-and-air-conditioning-mechanic-1)

[Level 2](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=refrigeration-and-air-conditioning-mechanic-2)

[Level 3](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=refrigeration-and-air-conditioning-mechanic-3)

Steamfitter/ Pipefitter 

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=steamfitter-pipefitter-1)

[Level 2](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=steamfitter-pipefitter-2)

[Level 3](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=steamfitter-pipefitter-3)

Sheet Metal Worker

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=sheet-metal-worker-1)

[Level 2](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=sheet-metal-worker-2)

[Level 3](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=sheet-metal-worker-3)

Gasfitter Class A

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=gasfitter-class-a-level-1)

Gasfitter Class B

[Level 1](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/self_assessment?trade=gasfitter-class-b-level-1)
